name: Wurfelgrauen
description:
Game Info

Teach those teethy dice some manners! 

The great 'Wurfelgrauen' will have you running through the halls of a mystical dungeon, controlled by the fearsome teethy dice. Make sure to beat those to oblivion or shoot a well-aimed die right where the eyecount's the highest!

Except, there's a well-calculated catch: Some of the enemies will drop special key dice. The sum of their eyecounts decides, which door will open next for you. So, make sure to hit (quite literally) the correct eyecount for the door of your choice, and you shall pass! 

Watch out for the teethy dice, hack your way through our carefully crafted dungeon and most importantly: Have fun! 

Instructions

W = Move Up 
A = Move Left
S = Move Down
D = Move Right

LMB = Attack
RMB = Shoot
Space = Block


Sadly our WebGL File got broken, so sorry for only providing a Windows zip!
